items.title: Final stage of Vuelta abandoned because of protests
items.standfirst: The final stage of the Vuelta a Espana is abandoned after pro-Palestinian protesters enter the course in the centre of Madrid.
items.content: The final stage of the Vuelta a Espana is abandoned after pro-Palestinian protesters enter the course in the centre of Madrid.

items.title: Political row erupts in Spain after Vuelta cycle race abandoned amid Gaza protests
items.standfirst: PM Pedro Sánchez accused of ‘embarrassing’ Spain after praising protesters who forced final stage to be abandonedThe premature and chaotic end of the Vuelta a España cycle race has triggered a bitter political row in Spain, with opposition politicians accusing the prime minister, Pedro Sánchez, of causing the country “international embarrassment” by encouraging pro-Palestinian demonstrators to disrupt the event.The race’s final stage was abandoned after groups protesting against the participation of the Israel-Premier Tech team swamped the finish line area and presentation podium in central Madrid on Sunday night. Continue reading...
items.content: PM Pedro Sánchez accused of ‘embarrassing’ Spain after praising protesters who forced final stage to be abandonedThe premature and chaotic end of the Vuelta a España cycle race has triggered a bitter political row in Spain, with opposition politicians accusing the prime minister, Pedro Sánchez, of causing the country “international embarrassment” by encouraging pro-Palestinian demonstrators to disrupt the event.The race’s final stage was abandoned after groups protesting against the participation of the Israel-Premier Tech team swamped the finish line area and presentation podium in central Madrid on Sunday night. Continue reading...

items.title: Pro-Palestinian protesters force an early end to Vuelta a Espana cycle race
items.standfirst: Pro-Palestinian protesters forced the Vuelta a Espana cycle race to be abandoned at its final stage as demonstrations blocked the finish line. Six of the last 10 days of the 1,900-mile race were either cut short or interrupted with protesters targeting an Israeli-owned team over the country’s war in Gaza.
items.content: Pro-Palestinian protesters forced the Vuelta a Espana cycle race to be abandoned at its final stage as demonstrations blocked the finish line. Six of the last 10 days of the 1,900-mile race were either cut short or interrupted with protesters targeting an Israeli-owned team over the country’s war in Gaza.

items.title: Spanish Vuelta finale cancelled as police clash with pro-Palestinian protesters in Madrid
items.standfirst: The finale of Spain's version of the Tour de France has been cancelled midway through after clashes between police and pro-Palestinian protesters in Madrid.
items.content: The finale of Spain's version of the Tour de France has been cancelled midway through after clashes between police and pro-Palestinian protesters in Madrid.

ai_summary: Pro-Palestinian protesters disrupted the final stage of the Vuelta a Espana cycle race in Madrid.
Demonstrators blocked the finish line, causing the race to be abandoned prematurely.
Protests targeted the Israel-Premier Tech team over the war in Gaza.
Spanish Prime Minister Sánchez was criticized for allegedly supporting the protesters.
Opposition politicians accused Sánchez of causing international embarrassment.

items.title: British prosecutors drop case against two men accused of spying for China
items.standfirst: Christopher Cash and Christopher Berry were due to go on trial next month charged with breaching Official Secrets ActBritish prosecutors have said they are dropping charges against two men, including a former researcher for a senior UK politician, who had been accused of spying for China.The men, ex-researcher Christopher Cash, 30, and Christopher Berry, 33, had denied accusations of providing information prejudicial to the interests of the state in breach of the Official Secrets Act between December 2021 and February 2023. Continue reading...
items.content: Christopher Cash and Christopher Berry were due to go on trial next month charged with breaching Official Secrets ActBritish prosecutors have said they are dropping charges against two men, including a former researcher for a senior UK politician, who had been accused of spying for China.The men, ex-researcher Christopher Cash, 30, and Christopher Berry, 33, had denied accusations of providing information prejudicial to the interests of the state in breach of the Official Secrets Act between December 2021 and February 2023. Continue reading...

items.title: Rubio visits Israel amid heightened tensions after attack on Qatar
items.standfirst: Secretary of State Marco Rubio visited Israel over the weekend, signaling that Washington wants answers after Israel’s unprecedented attack on Hamas leaders inside Qatar, another key American partner in the Middle East. NBC News' Keir Simmons reports.
items.content: Secretary of State Marco Rubio visited Israel over the weekend, signaling that Washington wants answers after Israel’s unprecedented attack on Hamas leaders inside Qatar, another key American partner in the Middle East. NBC News' Keir Simmons reports.

items.title: U.S. shows Israel support but seeks answers after Qatar attack stirs anger
items.standfirst: JERUSALEM — President Donald Trump may have hoped to be stitching together the final details of a peace deal, but instead his top diplomat landed in Jerusalem on Sunday to douse blazing tensions between U.S. allies
items.content: JERUSALEM — President Donald Trump may have hoped to be stitching together the final details of a peace deal, but instead his top diplomat landed in Jerusalem on Sunday to douse blazing tensions between U.S. allies

items.title: Trump's top diplomat seeks answers from Israel on way forward in Gaza after Qatar strike
items.standfirst: Donald Trump's top diplomat has arrived in the Middle East amid tensions over Israel's attack on Hamas inside Qatar that has upended efforts to broker an end to the Gaza war.
items.content: Donald Trump's top diplomat has arrived in the Middle East amid tensions over Israel's attack on Hamas inside Qatar that has upended efforts to broker an end to the Gaza war.

ai_summary: Marco Rubio visited Israel amid tensions after an attack on Qatar.
The US seeks answers from Israel after the attack on Hamas leaders.
President Trump's diplomat arrived in Jerusalem to address tensions.
Israel's attack on Hamas inside Qatar has upended peace efforts.
The US is seeking to understand the situation and its implications.

clusters.title: Romania becomes second Nato country to report Russian drone in its airspace
clusters.neutral_headline: Romania Reports Russian Drone in Its Airspace
bullet_summary: Romania has said a drone breached its airspace during a Russian attack on neighbouring Ukraine
Reported by BBC World, Sky News World

items.title: Romania becomes second Nato country to report Russian drone in its airspace
items.standfirst: Ukraine's President Zelensky called the incursion "an obvious expansion of the war by Russia".
items.content: Ukraine's President Zelensky called the incursion "an obvious expansion of the war by Russia".

items.title: Romania scrambles jets after Russian drone 'breaches airspace' - as Zelenskyy warns of war 'expansion'
items.standfirst: Romania has said a drone breached its airspace during a Russian attack on neighbouring Ukraine.
items.content: Romania has said a drone breached its airspace during a Russian attack on neighbouring Ukraine.

ai_summary: Romania reported a Russian drone in its airspace during an attack.
Ukraine's President Zelenskyy called the incursion an expansion of war.
Romania scrambled jets after the drone breached its airspace.
The incident occurred during a Russian attack on Ukraine.
The incursion has raised concerns about the conflict's expansion.
